articles.author: Brian Fung, CNN Business
articles.title: Sony to acquire video game studio Bungie in $3.6 billion deal - CNN
articles.description: Sony is acquiring Bungie, the video game studio that created hit franchises such as "Halo" and "Destiny," in a $3.6 billion deal that further centralizes the rapidly consolidating game industry.
